mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bon_board(writerId, title, content, views, itemLink, createAt, voteEndAt) VALUES (#{writerId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{views}, #{itemLink}, now(), #{voteEndAt})
mapper.select: select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by seq desc) as rowNo, b.* from bon_board b) bbs2 where bbs2.rowNo between #{start} and #{end}
select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by seq desc) as bbs_no, b.* from bon_board b) bbs2 where bbs2.bbs_no between ${start} and ${end}
